original_text: A young Hebrew was there with us, a servant of the captain of the guard. When we told him, he interpreted our dreams to us, giving an interpretation to each man according to his dream.
korean_text: 그 곳에 친위대장의 종 된 히브리 청년이 우리와 함께 있기로 우리가 그에게 말하매 그가 우리의 꿈을 풀되 그 꿈대로 각 사람에게 해석하더니

sentences.original_text: A young Hebrew was there with us
sentences.korean_translation: 한 젊은 히브리 사람이 우리와 함께 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: a servant of the captain of the guard
he interpreted our dreams to us
giving an interpretation to each man
